name: Drunken Style
description:
4 Drunken friends want to win Marathon Championship but forget to pay a meal at a bar.The crazy running begins so that the bar owner can't not catch up.

This project release at Thai Game Jam 2017.

Control: Keyboard Character from Title Screen

Team:

  •  Nravit Suwanplai - Project Leader
  • Panpol Sangsuan - Game Design, Developers
  • Yosanun Pattaphongse - Programmer
  • Nattawut Klaingkaew - 3D Artist
  • Nutt Prommee - Programmer
  • Somrak Photisar - 3D Artist
  • Nekarnda Hanpanit - Rigging Unit
  • Virunchai Gaewpalad - Programmer
  • Pukit Sela - Programmer

Video Game Play:

Advisor: Banyapon Poolsawas

College of Creative Design and Entertainment Technology, Dhurakij Pundit University, Thailand
